title: Hour 1: Relax Mr. Rodgers
description:
Mad Dog Russo and Stephen A. battle it out over a variety of topics. The two start by discussing how much responsibility Rodgers should have with the Packers WR development. Then the two debate whether Patrick Mahomes will be better this season even without Tyreek Hill. Things get heated when Mad Dog says Serena is not the undisputed G.O.A.T of women's tennis. Later Sam Acho joins the crew and they debate just how far Lamar Jackson can take the Ravens this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
